verses.verse: Sing, <S%H7442><s%> O barren, <S%H6135><s%> thou that didst not <S%H3808><s%> bear; <S%H3205><s%> break forth <S%H6476><s%> into singing, <S%H7440><s%> and cry aloud, <S%H6670><s%> thou that didst not <S%H3808><s%> travail with child: <S%H2342><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> more <S%H7227><s%> are the children <S%H1121><s%> of the desolate <S%H8074><s%> than the children <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> of the married wife, <S%H1166><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Enlarge <S%H7337><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> of thy tent, <S%H168><s%> and let them stretch forth <S%H5186><s%> the curtains <S%H3407><s%> of thine habitations: <S%H4908><s%> spare <S%H2820><s%> not, <S%H408><s%> lengthen <S%H748><s%> thy cords, <S%H4340><s%> and strengthen <S%H2388><s%> thy stakes; <S%H3489><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> thou shalt break forth <S%H6555><s%> on the right hand <S%H3225><s%> and on the left; <S%H8040><s%> and thy seed <S%H2233><s%> shall inherit <S%H3423><s%> the Gentiles, <S%H1471><s%> and make the desolate <S%H8074><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> to be inhabited. <S%H3427><s%>

Fear <S%H3372><s%> not; <S%H408><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> be ashamed: <S%H954><s%> neither <S%H408><s%> be thou confounded; <S%H3637><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> be put to shame: <S%H2659><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> thou shalt forget <S%H7911><s%> the shame <S%H1322><s%> of thy youth, <S%H5934><s%> and shalt not <S%H3808><s%> remember <S%H2142><s%> the reproach <S%H2781><s%> of thy widowhood <S%H491><s%> any more. <S%H5750><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> thy Maker <S%H6213><s%> is thine husband; <S%H1166><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> is his name; <S%H8034><s%> and thy Redeemer <S%H1350><s%> the Holy One <S%H6918><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> The God <S%H430><s%> of the whole <S%H3605><s%> earth <S%H776><s%> shall he be called. <S%H7121><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath called <S%H7121><s%> thee as a woman <S%H802><s%> forsaken <S%H5800><s%> and grieved <S%H6087><s%> in spirit, <S%H7307><s%> and a wife <S%H802><s%> of youth, <S%H5271><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> thou wast refused, <S%H3988><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> thy God. <S%H430><s%>
For a small <S%H6996><s%> moment <S%H7281><s%> have I forsaken <S%H5800><s%> thee; but with great <S%H1419><s%> mercies <S%H7356><s%> will I gather <S%H6908><s%> thee.

In a little <S%H8241><s%> wrath <S%H7110><s%> I hid <S%H5641><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> thee for a moment; <S%H7281><s%> but with everlasting <S%H5769><s%> kindness <S%H2617><s%> will I have mercy <S%H7355><s%> on thee, saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy Redeemer. <S%H1350><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> is as the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Noah <S%H5146><s%> unto me: for <S%H834><s%> as I have sworn <S%H7650><s%> that the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Noah <S%H5146><s%> should no more <S%H5750><s%> go <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the earth; <S%H776><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> have I sworn <S%H7650><s%> that I would not be wroth <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7107><s%> with <S%H5921><s%> thee, nor rebuke <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1605><s%> thee.

For <S%H3588><s%> the mountains <S%H2022><s%> shall depart, <S%H4185><s%> and the hills <S%H1389><s%> be removed; <S%H4131><s%> but my kindness <S%H2617><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> depart <S%H4185><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> thee, neither <S%H3808><s%> shall the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of my peace <S%H7965><s%> be removed, <S%H4131><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> that hath mercy <S%H7355><s%> on thee.

O thou afflicted, <S%H6041><s%> tossed with tempest, <S%H5590><s%> and not <S%H3808><s%> comforted, <S%H5162><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> I <S%H595><s%> will lay <S%H7257><s%> thy stones <S%H68><s%> with fair colors, <S%H6320><s%> and lay thy foundations <S%H3245><s%> with sapphires. <S%H5601><s%>

And I will make <S%H7760><s%> thy windows <S%H8121><s%> of agates, <S%H3539><s%> and thy gates <S%H8179><s%> of carbuncles, <S%H68><s%> <S%H688><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> thy borders <S%H1366><s%> of pleasant <S%H2656><s%> stones. <S%H68><s%>
And all <S%H3605><s%> thy children <S%H1121><s%> shall be taught <S%H3928><s%> of the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and great <S%H7227><s%> shall be the peace <S%H7965><s%> of thy children. <S%H1121><s%>

In righteousness <S%H6666><s%> shalt thou be established: <S%H3559><s%> thou shalt be far <S%H7368><s%> from oppression; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6233><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> fear: <S%H3372><s%> and from terror; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4288><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> it shall not <S%H3808><s%> come near <S%H7126><s%> <S%H413><s%> thee.

Behold, <S%H2005><s%> they shall surely gather together, <S%H1481><s%> <S%H1481><s%> but not <S%H657><s%> by <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> me: whosoever <S%H4310><s%> shall gather together <S%H1481><s%> against <S%H854><s%> thee shall fall <S%H5307><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> thy sake.

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I <S%H595><s%> have created <S%H1254><s%> the smith <S%H2796><s%> that bloweth <S%H5301><s%> the coals <S%H6352><s%> in the fire, <S%H784><s%> and that bringeth forth <S%H3318><s%> an instrument <S%H3627><s%> for his work; <S%H4639><s%> and I <S%H595><s%> have created <S%H1254><s%> the waster <S%H7843><s%> to destroy. <S%H2254><s%>

No <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3605><s%> weapon <S%H3627><s%> that is formed <S%H3335><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> thee shall prosper; <S%H6743><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> tongue <S%H3956><s%> that shall rise <S%H6965><s%> against <S%H854><s%> thee in judgment <S%H4941><s%> thou shalt condemn. <S%H7561><s%> This <S%H2063><s%> is the heritage <S%H5159><s%> of the servants <S%H5650><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and their righteousness <S%H6666><s%> is of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> me, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
